title: Snapchat : distribution of global audiences 2020 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of active users for 2 number of Sexs.
The maximum Share of active users 61.0 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Sex is 38.0.
The highest Sex Female has 23.0 more Share of active users than the lowest Sex Male.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Share of active users in the y axis.
The maximum Share of active users 61.0 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Sex is 38.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of active users for 2 number of Sexs.
The maximum Share of active users 61.0 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Sex is 38.0.
The highest Sex Female has 23.0 more Share of active users than the lowest Sex Male.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Share of active users in the y axis.
Sex Female has the highest Share of active users and Male has the lowest Share of active users.
The difference of Share of active users between the highest and lowest Sex is 23.0.
The Sex Female has 1.23 times more Share of active users than average.
Summing up the values of all Sexs, we get total 99.0.
